Uses of Package
org.logevents.formatters.exceptions

  • Packages that use org.logevents.formatters.exceptions 
    Package Description
    org.logevents
    Log Events is a small (250kb, no dependencies) logging framework built on top of SLF4J - the logging lingua franka for Java.
    org.logevents.formatters  
    org.logevents.formatters.exceptions  
    org.logevents.mdc  
    org.logevents.observers
    Standard observers included in LogEvents that can be created in the configuration file with observer.myobs=ConsoleLogEventObserver (for example).
    org.logevents.observers.slack  
    org.logevents.observers.teams  
    org.logevents.optional.jakarta  
    org.logevents.optional.servlets  
    org.logevents.query  
  • Classes in org.logevents.formatters.exceptions used by org.logevents 
    Class Description
    ExceptionFormatter
    Presents the exception of a Log Event as a nicely formatted textual representation.
